definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: Use a little milk to soak the gelatine powder first.
sentences.chinese: 吉利丁先用少許牛奶浸泡開。

sentences.english: He had constipation for few days but still had flatus passage todays.
sentences.chinese: 他有少許日子是便祕的，但是今天仍然有排氣。

sentences.english: Although there was little food in the house, Jean concocted a splendid meal.
sentences.chinese: 雖然家裏只有少許食物，珍仍然烹調了一頓盛餐。

sentences.english: Remove them with a slotted ladle and toss with a little butter.
sentences.chinese: 用漏勺將它們撈出和少許黃油拌勻。

sentences.english: Little feedstuff in the drinking spoon is drunk out after several times of drinking.
sentences.chinese: 飲水勺中的少許飼料經幾次飲水即被喝淨。

sentences.english: If you like, add a dash of low fat milk and a single packet of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡，可以放入少許低脂牛奶或者一小包糖。

sentences.english: In this instance, you have a few hurdles to overcome.
sentences.chinese: 在此實例中，有少許障礙需要克服。

sentences.english: Add white wine to deglaze, then chicken bones, herb stems &water to cover.
sentences.chinese: 加少許白酒，然後放進雞骨，香料和水蓋鍋。

sentences.english: Heat up a skillet with some oil. Add in pine nuts and stir-fry until lightly golden.
sentences.chinese: 燒熱鍋入少許油，將松仁炒成金黃色，濾油。

sentences.english: Add chopped thyme into the marinate and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 之後加入少許切碎的百里香，攪拌均勻。

sentences.english: Again, there is little different so far from the second edition.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這兩章與第二版中的內容也有少許不同。

sentences.english: Grease a 6 or 7-inch Gugelhupf mould and dust lightly with a little of the flour, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 一個6或7寸的咕咕霍夫模具抹油灑上少許麪粉備用。

sentences.english: In hot water with a little vinegar, then dip in with soft cloth vinegar water wipe gently.
sentences.chinese: 在熱水中加入少許食醋，然後用軟布蘸醋水輕輕擦拭。

sentences.english: Pile the filling into the centre, then wet the edges with a little water.
sentences.chinese: 把原料堆在中間，然後用少許水醮溼邊緣。

sentences.english: Prepare a serving plate lightly greased with oil or butter.
sentences.chinese: 準備一個碟子，抹上少許油脂。

sentences.english: They found signs in one patient of a virus with limited similarity to polyoma viruses.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現一名患者的病毒與多瘤病毒有少許類似。

definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
